alert.note: Alert for Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk (New York) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 28 at 6:50PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...Strong thunderstorms will impact portions of western Suffolk and central Nassau Counties through 730 PM EDT... At 650 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Westbury to Farmingdale. Movement was east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Strong thunderstorms will be near... Plainview and Melville around 655 PM EDT. Lindenhurst and Dix Hills around 710 PM EDT. Deer Park around 715 PM EDT. Babylon around 720 PM EDT. Massapequa and Farmingdale around 725 PM EDT. Islip and Brentwood around 730 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: Torrential rainfall is also occurring with these storms and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Northern Nassau; Northwest Suffolk; Southwest Suffolk
